search_not_found_subtitle: Please try again with a different keyword

validator.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validator.name: Name must be at least 3 characters
validator.name_pattern: Name should not contain numbers or special characters
validator.password: Password must be at least 8 characters
validator.password_pattern: Password must contain an uppercase, a lowercase, a number and a special character

permissions.title: Permission required
permissions.camera: Please allow access to the camera to take photos
permissions.gallery: Please allow access to the gallery to select photos
permissions.camera_gallery: Please allow access to the camera and gallery to select photos

dio_messages.success: Success! Your operation was completed successfully.
dio_messages.bad_request_error: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
dio_messages.no_content: No content available at this moment.
dio_messages.forbidden_error: Insufficient permissions. You do not have the necessary permissions to perform this operation.
dio_messages.unauthorized_error: Authorization required. Please log in to continue.
dio_messages.notFound_error: Resource not found. The requested resource could not be located.
dio_messages.conflict_error: Conflict detected. The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
dio_messages.internal_server_error: Server error. An unexpected error has occurred on our end.
dio_messages.not_allowed: Method not supported. The method received in the request-line is known by the origin server but not supported by the target resource.
dio_messages.unknown_error: Unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
dio_messages.timeout_error: Server timeout. The server did not respond in the expected time frame.
dio_messages.default_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
dio_messages.cache_error: Cache access error. An error occurred while trying to access the cache.
dio_messages.no_internet_error: No internet connection. Please check your network and try again.
